text: The 1951 Census of Manipur was a census held in Manipur, India every ten years. == Language data == In the 1951 census, Meitei language (also known as Manipuri language) speakers account for 65.29% of the total population of Manipur. ==Related pages== * 1961 Census of Manipur == References == Category:History of Manipur Category:1951 in Asia Manipur
title: 1951 Census of Manipur
